verbs.description: [ARG0: Chinese state media] [V: struck] [ARG1: an optimistic note on trade talks between Chinese and U.S. officials] [ARGM-TMP: after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to impose tariffs on up to $ 150 billion in Chinese goods over allegations of intellectual property theft] .

Chinese state media struck an optimistic note on trade talks between Chinese and U.S. officials after [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to impose tariffs on up to $ 150 billion in Chinese goods over allegations of intellectual property theft] .
